attributes.action: Absent himself from the Rugby World Cup final
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Minister is Scottish, and given the antipathy of the Scots to the English, it would be a travesty for him to appear to be supporting England.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
